snippet: Physicians for Human Rights released a report on Wednesday that said Syrian government forces were responsible for 90 percent of the confirmed assaults on health care facilities.
abstract: Physicians for Human Rights reports that Syrian government forces in country's civil war have systematically attacked doctors and other medical workers in rebel-held areas, accounting for 90 percent of assaults on health care facilities; such violence can constitute crime against humanity under international law.
lead_paragraph: Physicians for Human Rights released a report on Wednesday that said Syrian government forces were responsible for 90 percent of the confirmed assaults on health care facilities.

headline.main: Health Care Workers Under Attack in Syria, Doctors Say
headline.print_headline: Health Care Under Attack in Syria, Doctors Say
